SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.task.lifecycle

Class SchedulerThread

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
civitas.celestis.task.lifecycle.SchedulerThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scheduler, ThreadedModule, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SyncScheduler
public class SchedulerThread extends Thread implements Scheduler
A scheduler thread. This can also be used as a single-core scheduler.

    • registerSync

      public void registerSync(@Nonnull Iterable<Task> i)
      Registers multiple tasks to this scheduler synchronously, registering all tasks to a single thread.
      Specified by:
      registerSync in interface Scheduler
      Parameters:
      i - The iterable object containing the tasks to register

    • registerAsync

      public void registerAsync(@Nonnull Iterable<Task> i)
      Registers multiple tasks to this scheduler asynchronously, evenly distributing the tasks across each thread of this scheduler. Since this is a single-threaded scheduler, this operation is equal to Scheduler.registerSync(Iterable).
      Specified by:
      registerAsync in interface Scheduler
      Parameters:
      i - The iterable object containing the tasks to register
